trans-unit.source: Represents an individual item of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"></xref> that is used in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示個別的資料項目<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery"></xref>中都使用<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the brush that is used to draw the background of the control when it is in the Checked state.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來處於選取狀態時，繪製控制項的背景的筆刷。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The brush that is used to draw the background of the control when it is in the Checked state.
trans-unit.target: 用來處於選取狀態時，繪製控制項的背景筆刷。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.CheckedBackground*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.CheckedBackground*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.CheckedBackground*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the brush that is used to draw the outer border of the control when it is in the Checked state.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來處於選取狀態時，繪製控制項外的框線的筆刷。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The brush that is used to draw the outer border of the control when it is in the Checked state.
trans-unit.target: 用來繪製控制項外的框線處於選取狀態時的筆刷。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.CheckedBorderBrush*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.CheckedBorderBrush*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.CheckedBorderBrush*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this item is highlighted.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出此項目會反白顯示。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this item is highlighted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此項目會反白顯示。，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsHighlighted*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsHighlighted*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsHighlighted*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the left mouse button or the SPACEBAR is pressed over the item.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否按滑鼠左鍵或空格鍵在項目上。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the left mouse button or the SPACEBAR is pressed over the item; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果滑鼠左鍵或空白鍵上按下項目。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsPressed*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsPressed*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsPressed*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this item is selected.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否選取這個項目。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`||

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this item is selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果選取此項目。，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsSelected*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsSelected*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsSelected*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut for the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的鍵盤快速鍵。

trans-unit.source: A KeyTip must be from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters.
trans-unit.target: KeyTip 必須介於 1 到 3 個大寫字元，而且必須包含空格、 定位字元或新行字元。

trans-unit.source: KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls.
trans-unit.target: 按鍵提示有時也稱為快速鍵或快速鍵，而且可用以啟動控制項的快速鍵組合。

trans-unit.source: KeyTips appear on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> when you press the ALT key.
trans-unit.target: 按鍵提示會出現在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>您按下 ALT 鍵。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The keyboard shortcut for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的鍵盤快速鍵。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 用於當滑鼠指標位於其上繪製控制項的背景筆刷。

trans-unit.source: Called when the KeyTip or accelerator key is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 當按下 KeyTip 或加速鍵時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Contains data about the activation.
trans-unit.target: 包含啟動有關的資料。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this control.
trans-unit.target: 建立新<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonGalleryItemAutomationPeer"></xref>物件對這個控制項。

trans-unit.source: A new automation peer object for this control.
trans-unit.target: 新自動化對等物件對這個控制項。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsHighlighted%2A> property to `true` when this control gets keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsHighlighted%2A>屬性`true`當這個控制項取得鍵盤焦點。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsHighlighted%2A>

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會將標示<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus>事件，如藉由設定處理<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>屬性的事件資料至`true`。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Called when the KeyTip or accelerator key is accessed.
trans-unit.target: 當存取 KeyTip 或加速鍵時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Contains data about the activation.
trans-unit.target: 包含啟動有關的資料。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsPressed%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsHighlighted%2A> properties to `false` when this control loses keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsPressed%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsHighlighted%2A>屬性`false`當這個控制項失去鍵盤焦點。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsHighlighted%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsPressed%2A>

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會將標示<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus>事件，如藉由設定處理<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>屬性的事件資料至`true`。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsHighlighted%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsPressed%2A> properties to `false` when the mouse pointer leaves this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsHighlighted%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsPressed%2A>屬性`false`當滑鼠指標離開此控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsPressed%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsHighlighted%2A>

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會將標示<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave>事件，如藉由設定處理<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>屬性的事件資料至`true`。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsHighlighted%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsHighlighted%2A>屬性`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsHighlighted%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the mouse button is pressed, it also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsPressed%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果按下滑鼠按鈕時，它也會設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsPressed%2A>屬性`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsPressed%2A>

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會將標示<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>事件，如藉由設定處理<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>屬性的事件資料至`true`。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsPressed%2A> property to `false` when the left mouse button is released over this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsPressed%2A>屬性`false`當此控制項上方放開滑鼠左鍵。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsPressed%2A>

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會將標示<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>事件，如藉由設定處理<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>屬性的事件資料至`true`。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: This method manages the focus and highlighting of the gallery item when the mouse moves over it.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會管理焦點時，反白顯示主機庫項目的當滑鼠移。

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會將標示<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>事件，如藉由設定處理<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>屬性的事件資料至`true`。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.Selected"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.Selected"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: This method is called when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsSelected%2A> property changes to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法時，會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsSelected%2A>屬性變更為`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsSelected%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.Unselected"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.Unselected"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: This method is called when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsSelected%2A> property changes to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法時，會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsSelected%2A>屬性變更為`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.IsSelected%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the brush that is used to draw the background of the control when it is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來繪製控制項的背景，按下後的筆刷。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The brush that is used to draw the background of the control when it is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 用來繪製控制項的背景，按下後的筆刷。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.PressedBackground*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.PressedBackground*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.PressedBackground*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the brush that is used to draw the outer border of the control when it is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來繪製控制項外的框線，按下後的筆刷。

trans-unit.target: 用來繪製控制項外的框，按下後的筆刷。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.PressedBorderBrush*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryItem.PressedBorderBrush*>

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that this control belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 取得參考<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref>所屬這個控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is set on the parent <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> control and is inherited by the child controls.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性設定其父系<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>控制，而且會繼承由子控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>

trans-unit.source: It is used to access visual style brushes defined on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> class.
trans-unit.target: 它用來存取在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>類別</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>上定義的視覺化樣式筆刷

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that this control belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 若要參考<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref>所屬這個控制項。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the descriptive text that is displayed in the ToolTip for this control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個控制項的工具提示中顯示的描述性文字。

trans-unit.source: > [!WARNING] > Each ribbon control inherits a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!WARNING]> 每個功能區控制項繼承<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set, the ribbon’s enhanced ToolTip will not be shown; the standard ToolTip will be shown instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性設定後，將不會顯示功能區的增強型工具提示，會改為顯示標準的工具提示。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The descriptive text to display in the ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示工具提示中的描述性文字。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。
